mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, coupon_id, user_id, use_status, receive_num, type ,dead_line
mapper.select:
select a.id as coupon_id,b.id as receive_id,a.name,a.reduction_full_money,a.reduction_post_money,a.discount_full_money,a.discount,a.type,b.receive_time, b.dead_line as dead_line,use_status from am_coupon a,am_coupon_rel_coupon_user b where a.del_flag = 0 and b.user_id = #{userId} and a.id = b.coupon_id
and b.use_status = 2 and DATE_FORMAT(b.dead_line, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
and (b.use_status = 1 or DATE_FORMAT(b.dead_line,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'))
